title: Workshop on Augmented Reality-Based Immersive Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where pre-service teachers directly design and evaluate science education content using augmented reality technology

learning_goals: The educational effectiveness of three case studies applying augmented reality applications to science education can be analyzed.
Immersive learning modules for science experiment simulations can be designed using AR development tools (e.g., Unity + AR Foundation).
AR-based project deliverables (3D models, quiz systems, etc.) for assessing learning outcomes can be created, and peer evaluations can be conducted.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
